metadata.title: CVE-2021-0145 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper initialization of shared resources in some Intel(R) Processors mayallow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosurevia local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-0145` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20220510.0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20220510.0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
